name: @adguard/extensions
description: This is a monorepo with packages developed by the extensions developers at AdGuard
author: Adguard Software Ltd.

scripts.tgz: lerna run build --scope @adguard/dnr-rulesets --scope @adguard/api --scope @adguard/api-mv3 --include-dependencies && lerna run tgz --scope @adguard/dnr-rulesets --scope @adguard/api --scope @adguard/api-mv3 --include-dependencies
